mapper.select: select s.s_name as s_name, p.pd_name as pd_name, round(p.price-(p.price*p.discount/100), -1) as discount, p.status as status, r.pd_no as pd_no, r.userid as userid, r.img as img, r.content as content, r.writedate as writedate, r.rating as rating from product p, store s, review r where p.s_no=s.s_no and r.pd_no=p.pd_no

select pd_no, s_no, pd_name, price, round(price-(price*discount/100), -1) as discount, main_img, stock, status, sub_c, pd_img from product
order by pd_no desc
where pd_no in (select pd_no from (select p.pd_no, c.pc_no, c.pc_date from product p, purchase c where p.pd_no=c.pd_no order by c.pc_date desc))
order by (price-(price*discount/100))

select * from (select s.main_c as main_c, s.c_code as c_code, p.s_no as s_no, p.pd_no as pd_no, p.pd_name as pd_name, p.price as price, p.discount as discount, round(p.price-(p.price*p.discount/100), -1) as dc_price, p.main_img as main_img, p.sub_c as sub_c from product p, sub_c s where p.sub_c=s.sub_c)
order by pd_no desc
where c_code=#{c_code} orde by pd_no desc
select userid, pd_no, rating, content, writedate, s_no from review where pd_no=#{pd_no}

select pd_no, s_no, pd_name, price, discount, round(price-(price*discount/100), -1) as dc_price, main_img, stock, status, sub_c from product where pd_no in (select pd_no from (select pd_no from product order by pd_no desc) where rownum < 9)
select pd_no, s_no, pd_name, price, discount, main_img, stock, status, sub_c, pd_img, pd_exp, o_value from product where s_no=#{s_no}
select pd_no, s_no, pd_name, price, round(price-(price*discount/100), -1) as discount, main_img, stock, status, sub_c, pd_img, pd_exp, shipping_c, o_value from product where pd_no=#{pd_no}
select p.pd_no, p.pd_name, p.main_img, p.discount, p.price, s.s_no, s.s_name from product p, store s where p.s_no=s.s_no
mapper.insert: insert into product(pd_no, s_no, pd_name, price, discount, main_img, stock, status, sub_c, main_c, pd_img, pd_exp, shipping_c, o_value) values(pd_sq.nextval, #{s_no}, #{pd_name}, #{price}, #{discount}, #{main_img}, #{stock}, #{status}, #{sub_c}, #{main_c}, #{pd_img}, #{pd_exp}, #{shipping_c}, #{o_value})
mapper.update: update product set pd_name=#{pd_name}, price=#{price}, discount=#{discount}, stock=#{stock}, status=#{status}, sub_c=#{sub_c}, main_c=#{main_c}, pd_exp=#{pd_exp}, shippig_c=#{shipping_c}, o_value=#{o_value} where pd_no=#{pd_no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from product where s_no=#{s_no}

select * from (select sub.sub_c as sub_c, sub.main_c as main_c, p.pd_no as pd_no, p.s_no s_no, p.pd_name as pd_name, p.main_img as main_img, p.pd_img as pd_img, p.price as price, p.discount as discount, round(p.price-(p.price*discount/100), -1) as dc_price, p.shipping_c as shipping_c, p.o_value as o_value, s.s_name from store s, product p, sub_c sub where s.s_no=p.s_no and p.sub_c=sub.sub_c) where pd_no=#{pd_no}
